attributes.background: Stop people wasting peoples time with pointless petitions

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

The standards for e-petitions already state that we cannot accept petitions that are nonsense or a joke, and we're not sure what petitions you don't want to be accepted.

You can read the standards for e-petitions here: https://petition.parliament.uk/help#standards
